name: CNP
condition:
input.kyc.clientNotPresent.referenceCode == "CNP_REP"
|| input.kyc.clientNotPresent.referenceCode == "CNP_ACHOL"
|| input.kyc.clientNotPresent.referenceCode == "CNP_BPBIT"
|| input.kyc.clientNotPresent.referenceCode == "CNP_BPWOSM"
|| input.kyc.clientNotPresent.referenceCode == "CNP_BPWBA"
|| input.kyc.clientNotPresent.referenceCode == "CNP_BPWOBA"

name: DAUD
condition:
input.transactionAmount > input.kyc.availableBalance && (
input.kyc.holdFullBalanceIndicator == true
|| input.kyc.beginHold == true
|| input.kyc.holdToday == true
|| input.kyc.unavailable == true
|| input.kyc.holdFullBalanceIndicator == true
)

name: DAIF
condition:
input.transactionAmount > input.kyc.availableBalance
&& (
input.kyc.holdFullBalanceIndicator == false
&& input.kyc.beginHold == false
&& input.kyc.holdToday == false
&& input.kyc.unavailable == false
&& input.kyc.holdFullBalanceIndicator == false
)

name: CHARGE_MODIFIED
description: Partial / Full Charges are Waived Rule

name: FX_MODIFIED
description: Foreign Exchange Rate is Modified Rule
